title: Microsoft updates OneDrive for Business, improves sync client for Windows and Mac
text:
Microsoft updates OneDrive for Business, improves sync client for Windows and Mac 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
Microsoft has overhauled OneDrive for Business on the web with better UI and enhanced sharing ability, and has made updated sync clients ava...
